properties.name: limit
properties.description: The number of videos to record, default 1 (on iOS always 1)

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Max duration in seconds, default 0, which is 'forever'

properties.name: highquality
properties.description: Set to true to override the default low quality setting

properties.name: frontcamera
properties.description: Set to true to override the default backfacing camera setting.You'll want to sniff the useragent/device and pass the best overlay based on that.. assuming iphone here

properties.name: portraitOverlay
properties.description: put the png overlay in your assets folder

properties.name: landscapeOverlay
properties.description: not passing an overlay means no image is shown for the landscape orientation
